title: Server transfer Error.
body:
Hello guys!

I have recently transferred one of my accounts from EUW to NA but the transfer has been unsuccessful, I have been waiting for around 5 hours now and I've come to the conclusion that something is definitely not right. I have transferred an account before from EUW to NA and it was near enough instant. I have tried logging into the account on EUW where Its coming up with an error saying that my account transfer is in progress. I've tried logging into NA but its just not having it! Can anybody help me with this?

Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Are you still encountering issues with your transfer being in limbo? If so, reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our account specialists will get back in touch to help sort this out.

Let me know if you have any questions or concerns for me.
